## Loading Packages
```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

## Simulating a dataset

```{r}
set.seed(123)
n <- 500
hospital_data <- tibble(
  age = rnorm(n, 65, 10),
  comorbidities = sample(0:5, n, replace = TRUE),
  readmitted = rbinom(n, 1, 0.3)
)

# Logistic regression
model <- glm(readmitted ~ age + comorbidities, data = hospital_data, family = "binomial")

summary(model)
```
